sentences.sContent: ...A politician noted for being cautious asserts that sustainable human development depends on the natural environment...
...as sociologist Scott Winship noted in a recent article based on his analysis of this data...
...noted in a blog post about his objections...

...A recent article in The Harvard Crimson noted the shocking growth of Harvard's public relations arm in the last five years and it questioned whether a focus on risk management and avoiding controversy was really the best outward-looking face of this great institution...
...It should be noted that many people feel their life is both happy and meaningful...
...Many studies have noted the connection between a happy mind and a healthy body - the happier you are...
...When a noted leader on the art of management...

synos.tran: 著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的

words.tran: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的
显而易见的，显著的；值得注意的
显著地，明显地；引人注目地
笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子

trans.tranOther: well known or famous, especially because of some special quality or ability
